QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Shoulder replacement - discharge
QAPair.Answer: You had shoulder replacement surgery to replace the bones of your shoulder joint with artificial joint parts. The parts include a stem made of metal and a metal ball that connects with a plastic liner that acts as a bearing. Now that you're going home, be sure to follow your surgeon's instructions on how to take care of your new shoulder. Use the information below as a reminder.
